abstract: Almost 200 firefighters battle blaze at General Electric's Appliance Park in Louisville, Ky, big manufacturing plant that employs thousands.
lead_paragraph: Nearly 200 firefighters fought a fire at General Electric’s Appliance Park in Louisville, the sprawling manufacturing center that employs thousands.

headline.main: Kentucky: Fire Shuts a G.E. Manufacturing Plant
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Fire Shuts a G.E. Manufacturing Plant

snippet: Nearly 200 firefighters fought a fire at General Electric’s Appliance Park in Louisville, the sprawling manufacturing center that employs thousands.
